typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_source_system as string,
		description as string,
		active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StaSourceSystem
StaSourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		active,
		description,
		pk_source_system
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedColumns
RemoveUnusedColumns derive(pk_source_system = 'N/A',
		description = 'Not Applicable') ~> NotApplicable
NotApplicable aggregate(groupBy(pk_source_system),
	description = first(description)) ~> NotApplicableRow
RemoveUnusedColumns, NotApplicableRow union(byName: true)~> UnionWithNotApplicable
UnionWithNotApplicable derive(last_updated_by = 'm_pre_dim_source_system') ~> LastUpdatedBy
LastUpdatedBy alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		pk_source_system as string,
		description as string,
		active as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk_source_system'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		pk_source_system,
		description,
		active,
		last_updated_by
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimSourceSystem
